name: White Check Mats
description:
A necessity to anyone who appreciates Japanese interior styling! (=^‥^=)┘♪└(=^‥^=)┐♪

***"EXTRA PICS" TOP TAB HAS MEASUREMENT IMAGES AND MANY MORE DETAILED PICTURES***

These are a "universal" style floor mat.  They fit s-chassis exceptionally well.  I have provided detailed measurements so that you may make your own decision as to how well they will fit in your vehicle.

- Brand New

- Colors:  WHITE/Black ☆ RED/Black ☆ BLUE/Black

- Quantity: (2) Front Floor Mats 

- Images are in a s13 (240sx)
- s14 fitment is almost exactly the same.  If you would like, shoot me an email, and I can provide pictures. (See EXTRA PICS at top.)

- Quality is very good.  They are studded underneath for an anti-slip fit.  Heel pad is built in on the driver side.

**PLEASE NOTE:  For the passenger side the mat will lay against the cover by your ECU.  I recommend trimming about 1/2inch off the bottom of your plastic cover to allow the mat to slide under smoothly.  This will allow for a smooth flat full fitment.  Of course this is not necessary, but for the best fitment I recommend it.  You can see in the pictures that I have done this. **

*Please do not inquire as to whether they will fit your vehicle.  Measurements are provided for your use. *

name: Long Leather Knob
description:
Color - Black Leather
Size - About 160mm Length 
Applicable Vehicle - Almost all (Nissan, Honda, Toyota ect.)

Brand New in Box

*I had this same knob in my s13 for a while and got lots of PM's asking where I got it ect.. This is a heavy knob at about 220g it feels awesome.  Perfect height yet retains classiness.*

**Last picture for reference only, knob is new. **

name: Slim Pink Bubble Knob
description:
Color - Aqua Pink
Size - 160mm Length
Applicable Vehicle - Almost all (Nissan, Honda, Toyota ect.)

Brand New in Box

*Not huge and gaudy, it has a slim design yet retains that flare (∩_∩).*

name: NARDI Silver 330mm
description:
- Color: Black Leather / Silver Spokes
- Brand: NARDI 
- Size: 33cm/330mm 
- Hub: Nardi/Personal 6-bolt 
- Condition: Leather excellent condition. Few small surface scuffs from use but nothing that really penetrates into the leather. No tears whatsoever. Small scratches on the face from screws ect. Overall condition is 8.5/10. 

Stamped on back is "MADE IN ITALY" "FET on leather" and ""DE - ON" between screw holes.

- More pictures available upon request.

name: Woodgrain Deep Corn 340mm
description:
- Color: Woodgrain
- Size: 34cm/340mm DEEPCORN
- Hub: Boss/Momo/Standard 6-bolt
- Condition: 9.5/10. Has a few minute nicks and one very small scratch.  Overall the wheel has a new appearance.

*Blitz horn button is $30 extra if purchased with the wheel*

- More pictures available upon request.

name: TOMEI Leather 350mm
description:
- Color: Black Leather with Black face. TOMEI Stamped above middle spoke.
- Brand: TOMEI "Made in Italy" stamped on back. 
- Size: 35cm/350mm 
- Hub: Boss/Momo/6-Bolt 
- Condition: 8/10. Couple imperfections. Face has a small scratch. Leather is in excellent shape. One small scuff on the bottom spoke and one on the right spoke.  The leather is very soft unlike what a Nardi generally feels like. The one thing really wrong with this wheel is all around in perfect width the leather is separated about 1mm.  It is uniform and is not coming apart or falling apart in any way.  It looks like it is almost supposed to be that way but I think its just from the leather tightening over time.  They are really old and hard to find wheels, so it is understandable.

- Horn button is hazy, but it is included.  I have seen these horn buttons sell for $50-100 alone.

*More pictures available upon request*

name: BLITZ Horn Button
description:
- Hard to find Blitz Button.
- Condition: BRAND NEW
- Gloss Black background with reflective Gold writing.

*Purchase this button in combination with a wheel and receive a $5 discount*

-More pictures available upon request.

NOTE:  Wheel not included.  Demonstration purposes only.

- Notes: Tomei wheels are extremely hard to find.  I am excited to be able to offer this wheel to people in America! ^_^
